full_summary:
# HVAC System Repairs and Replacement

## Tender Announcement

**Reference Number:** WS4089073631
**Contract Solicitation Number:** WS4089073631
**Publication Date:** 2023-07-07
**Tender Closure Date:** 2023-07-24T14:00:00

**Project Details:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites contractors to participate in a tender for HVAC valve replacement services at the CFIA lab in Charlottetown, PEI.

**Scope of Work:**

* Air valve replacement in the HVAC system.

## Key Information

* **Contact Details:**
	+ Name: Richard Parsons (contact person)
	+ Email: richard.parsons@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Tender Submission Requirements:**
	+ Written inquiries and questions must be submitted to the Contracting Authority at least 5 calendar days before the closing date.
* **Contract Details:**
	+ Contract Value: TBA
	+ Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-08-31
	+ Expected Contract End Date: None (currently published)
	+ Region of Delivery: Prince Edward Island

## Trade Agreements

* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Procurement Method

* Competitive - Open bidding

## Selection Criteria

* Lowest Price

## Attachment Information

* No attachments are provided with this announcement.

**Accessing the Tender Announcement:**

View the full tender announcement on the [Ariba Discovery Platform](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16807616?extsite=MTY4MDc2MTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) under contract reference number WS4089073631. Note that the tender is now expired.
